content: this super-easy super-quick project is designed specifically with beginner knitters in mind the bow is made with a simple garter stitch square gathered simply by tying yarn around the centre the bow is attached to a garter stitch headband gauge gauge isn t crucial for this project as you simply stop knitting the headband once it is long enough to fit around the wearer s head update march 9 2020 upon reviewing this pattern i noticed that i had incorrectly stated the pattern for gauge/gauge as garter stitch when it is actually stocking stitch gauge however is not crucial for this project i have also corrected a typo in the pattern the pattern available at the link given is current
